Name: Dream Contagion
Description: Complete the challenge and defeat the Nightmare hidden within the Dreamscape Node.
QuestDesc: Complete the challenge and defeat the Nightmare hidden within the Dreamscape Node.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: {PlayerName}. Can you hear me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I've just received confirmation that some of the Nightmare Tacet Discords that appeared in Septimont have been eliminatedâ€”under your blade as usual. Wonderfully done.

Options.PlotLineKey: Just a walk in the park.
Just a friendly tourist who happened to pass by.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That walk you had certainly gave us a surprise. As a matter of fact, we've managed to discover something unique from the Septimont Dreamscape Sample.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Whether it's purely by chance or a work a fate is something worth pondering. As a matter of fact, we've managed to discover something unique from the Septimont Dreamscape Sample.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm sure you still have memories of that invitation you received to the Somnoire Film Festival, yes?

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, then that'll make explaining all the easier. It has been troubling us ever since we first learned of the invitation's existence. After all, the Deep Water Zone has always been a realm we've yet to peer into its secrets.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Data samples collected from Septimont reveal a similar frequency. We reckon this was how the invitation made its way to you after traversing the Deep Water Zone through utilizing the frequency's unique signatures.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Worry not. Long story short, we managed to form a general idea of the reason behind the sudden burst in activity of the Somnoire's depths.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, we still lack sufficient samples to verify our hypothesis. If you don't mind, we'd like to have you take out the remaining Nightmare Tacet Discords.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Their coordinates have been sent to your Terminal. Per usual, you will be rewarded for your hard work. We appreciate your aid, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We've confirmed and gathered all Dreamscape Samples, {PlayerName}. Well done.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ivory Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hate to break to you, {PlayerName}. Things are more complicated than we thought. Meow! We even found that cinema from last time in these samples.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ivory Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Don't worry, you'll get your rewards. We promise. Meow! Guess what, {PlayerName}? We found that cinema from last time in these samples.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Do not interrupt. I am the one in charge of reporting!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ivory Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...Meow.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'll keep it brief. Nightmare Tacet Discords of Septimont carry a unique frequency which can restore connection with the Deep Water Zone, similar to the moment when the invitation was sent.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: One thing is certain that the severed connection of Rinascita's Somnoire has something to do with it.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yet, so far, we are unable to identify the frequency's origin.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ivory Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Our theory is that the Dark Tide might be the reason behind it! The Nightmare samples we collected has signs of Dark Tide all over!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How many times do I have to tell you I'm the one making the report! Keep those unreasonable imaginations to yourself!

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, then. The situation within the Deep remains unclear, but there is no doubt that the Somnoire and Rinascita will continue to fall victim under this frequency's influence.

Dialogues.Speaker: Ebony Gatekeeper
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Be sure to keep an eye out for any Nightmare Tacet Discords you may come across during your travels to other regions of Rinascita, {PlayerName}.
